title: Mobile bottom tab bar strip background #1a1a1a

requirements.summary: Make the mobile BottomNav strip behind icons use a solid #1a1a1a background while keeping button and active-state styling unchanged.
acceptanceCriteria: On mobile (md:hidden BottomNav), the bar behind the icons renders with background color #1a1a1a (visibly darker than before).
The icon/button backgrounds (bg-bottom-nav-button) remain the same as before.
Active tab styling remains the same as before (active text-primary and icon fill-primary).
The background color is not transparent and is visually consistent across routes.

file_operations.description: Update the Tailwind color token for 'bottom-nav-bar' so 'bg-bottom-nav-bar' resolves to a solid #1a1a1a (without changing 'bottom-nav-button' or active-state related tokens).
Confirm the BottomNav container continues to use the existing 'bg-bottom-nav-bar' class and that per-button background and active-state classes remain unchanged after the color token update.

requirements.summary: Fix BottomNav background styling reliability by ensuring the Tailwind token used for the bar background resolves correctly (not ignored due to CSS variable formatting).
acceptanceCriteria: After implementation, changing the bottom-nav bar color results in an observable UI difference in the running app (not just in code).
No regressions to other theme colors outside the bottom navigation bar strip.

file_operations.description: Replace the current CSS-variable-based definition for the 'bottom-nav-bar' Tailwind color with a compatible value format (e.g., a direct hex color) so Tailwind-generated 'bg-bottom-nav-bar' styles are applied reliably, without altering other theme tokens.
